* "higher ordered structures" - This refers to the ability of the copolymer incorporating angular-fused NDT units to pack into more ordered structures, resulting in higher OFET mobilities.
* "higher OFET mobilities" - This refers to the improved performance of the copolymer incorporating angular-fused NDT units in organic field-effect transistors (OFETs), compared to linear-fused NDT units.
